knimeNode.name: MXML.GZ Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node imports an event log from an MXML.GZ file.

fullDescription.intro: This node imports an event log from an MXML.GZ file.
fullDescription.option:
The method to read an event log. There are two methods available:
OPEN NAIVE:
Open XES standard reading method.
IEEE Lenient:
IEEE XES can read a lenient IEEE XES log from a plain XML serialization.
